body.name: Shave Butter - The Best Shaving Cream for Head Arms Legs and Body - Shaving Conditioner Cream
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 55 mins
features: MOISTURIZING SHAVE CREAM: Spreads easily and washes off without soap. Provides nourishment for your skin and it is the perfect slick surface for the head, arms, legs and body where OmniShaver performs best! This pre shave lotion sensitive/moisturizing shave cream is your perfect shaving companion - keeping your skin silky, smooth, and hydrated all day long.

REFRESHING TEA TREE, ALOE & SHEA BUTTER: Tea Tree, Aloe and Shea Butter, so it's soothing on your skin and gives your skin a pleasant yet subtle scent throughout the day. With our shea butter, aloe and tea tree shaving cream, your skin will look and feel fresh anytime, anywhere.

DOUBLE THE NUMBER OF SHAVES: OmniShaver is cleverly designed with safety in mind, our safe razor uses your skin as a "strop" to self-straighten and polish its blades' edges during use. If properly maintained and used, Omnishaver will provide at least twice the number of shaves other shavers or razors can provide. Minimal usage of the OmniShave Butter, Only quarter-sized dab (½ tsp.)! A little OmniShave Butter lasts until the end of your shave.

EFFECTIVE AND EASY TO USE: Thick so it won't run when first squeezed out. Thin when rubbed so it spreads easily, and will wash off easily without the use of a detergent or soap. Stays slippery throughout your shave and can be applied as a moisturizer after your shave!

GUARANTEE: Shave butter are manufactured in the USA. FREE Fast Shipping Within the USA. Your satisfaction is our priority, we are committed to providing high-quality shave conditioner for unisex. In case you have any issues, feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get your smoothest, closest shave ever with OmniShave Shave Butter from OmniShaver! This exclusive, non-GMO shaving cream provides unbeatable glide and moisture for a refreshing, irritation-free shave. The unique non-lathering formula applies thick from the tube, then melts into a slick, thin layer when rubbed in. It goes on white so you can see where you've applied, then becomes clear for an even coat. Incredibly, just a 2 inch squeezed stripe is all you need for your entire shave! Apply it on wet skin for optimal performance. Get the closest, cleanest shave imaginable with OmniShaver's OmniShave Shave Butter. Just 2 inches and a wet face are all you need for unbeatable lubrication. Your skin will love the nourishing natural ingredients. Ditch your foams and gels - this non-lathering shave cream is the revolution you've been waiting for! Made in the USA, OmniShave delivers shaving bliss.

Only Small Amount Needed You don't need more than 2 inch squeezed stripe of OmniShave Butter because you aren't rinsing during your shave (which typically washes away lubrication before your shave is finished) so a little OmniShave Butter lasts until the end of your shave. Apply On Wet Skin It’s thick and velvety, which means it won’t pre-leak all over the shower floor when you pop the cap. It’s milky white when it touches the skin, then turns translucent with every swipe until shaved clean. Moisturizing With smooth glide application, it doubles as a lotion to hydrate dry, sensitive skin; all day long. Infused with tea tree, aloe, and shea butter that work together to give you that weightless sensation we love, soothing and has anti-inflammatory benefits. You can re-apply after shave is complete to moisturize your skin.

Natural Ingredients for the Smoothest, Most Comfortable Shave OmniShave stays slippery and moisturizing throughout your entire shave - no mid-shave rinsing required! The non-lathering formula provides plenty of lubrication and glide without thick suds, allowing the razor to move smoothly across the skin. When paired with the bi-directional OmniShaver, this concentrated shave butter is all you need for the ultimate glide. No soap or additional products required! It's so deliciously buttery that you can also use it as a daily moisturizer. Just apply after shaving and let it soak in. Natural ingredients like anti-inflammatory tea tree oil, soothing shea butter, and antioxidant aloe vera provide skin-nourishing benefits. OmniShave leaves skin feeling silky soft, never dry or tight. It contains no parabens or other harsh chemicals and is never tested on animals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It doesn't get better than this!
reviews.reviewText: I started using this product directly from the manufacturer. I was happy to find it on Amazon. I have never had as smooth and as close of a shave using any other product. In fact my skin is so sensitive I would only use high quality razors and water to shave. This has changed my shave for good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I been using this product for several years. It’s leaves a smooth feeling on my face and head after shaving. I do t get the shave bump on my neck as it would with regular shaving cream. I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall good product
reviews.reviewText: This thing isn’t perfect but so far I’m pretty happy with it. They aren’t kidding about pressing firmly and doing quick continuous strokes - if you don’t do that this will tug your hair and not shave very well. The shaving experience..... I wouldn’t call it pleasant because it is kind of like sandpapering your head. But, this thing gives me a closer shave than I get from a single pass with a safety razor, I haven’t gotten any cuts, and it’s much faster. A couple times my skin has been pretty red and had that rubbed-raw feeling but I put their shave butter on once I’m done shaving (and before obviously) and that seems to remove all redness and irritation within a few hours. So, I’m still looking for my favorite head shaving method but at least for now this is my go-to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Husband loves this item. Leaves skin soft and moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Its an ok product. Im not overly happy or disappointed. Im a woman and have used body shaving lotions and was looking for a comparable one. Im not sure about the statement about not using a lot. I didnt seem to use any less than normal. Had a nice texture and feel after. I like the smell but id have to think other woman might not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I like this product a lot. I've only been shaving my head for a short time. I started using OmniShaver, which I find easy to use, effective and efficient. The OmniShaver Shave Butter really improves the whole experience. A very small amount goes a long way. It provides for a really smooth shave. As noted elsewhere, it helps to wet your head first and to follow the instructions to take long, firm strokes. My head was clean, remarkably smooth, and--well, I was pleased with the results. The price struck me as a little high, until I realized how little I needed to use at a time. I don't have a lot of products to compare it to in terms of quality or cost, but I'm very happy with this one.

Fantastico,il miglior shave butter.uso il dollar shave club,il van der hagen ,e il burro omnishaver.li uso per rasarmi la testa con il gillette fusion proshield flexball e il gillette labs exfoliant bar.ottima scorrevolezza ,ottima protezione ottima idratazione post rasatura. Molto contento di questo shave butter.consegna sempre ottima
